episode.title: 勝利の使い方
How to Use a Victory
Comment exploiter une victoire
Shouri no Tsukaikata
episode.summary: Tanya just barely manages to restrain herself from disobeying her superior officers and attacking the Republic remanents. But the Republic forces have escaped overseas, and vowed to fight to the bitter end. The Empire has been victorious, but in its victory it has terrified the rest of the world and spurred them to action. Is true victory possible at all? Source: crunchyroll
